info.author: C.Kim
info.description:
This is a fork of browser-cookie3, streamlined to work with multiple profiles on Chromium.

# cookiejar #

* ***What does it do?*** Retrieves decrypted cookies from your browser.
* ***Which browsers are supported?*** Known Chromium-based browsers.

## Install ##
```bash
pip3 install profile_cookies
=======
```

## Usage ##

```python
from profile_cookies import Profile 

cookies = Profile(browser = "edge", profile = "default")
cookies.cookiejar() # -> http.cookiejar.Cookiejar
cookies.cookie("bitbucket") # -> http.cookiejar.Cookie

print(cookies.browsers) # -> dict of all local Chromium browser names and paths 
cookies.browser = "chrome" # .browser can be reassigned with cascading changes

print(cookies.profiles) # -> dict of all Browser profiles and paths 
cookies.profile = "profile 1" # -> .profile can be reassigned with cascading changes
cookies.cookiestring("msn") # -> returns a cookie in str format
```
Retrieved cookies can be used when making requests via urllib or through a package like requests.
info.name: profile-cookies
info.summary: A package to decrypt encrypted cookies from your browser.
